did.unittitle: Xavier University Budget Review Committee records
did.abstract: This is a collection of meeting minutes and related papers of the Xavier University Budget Review Committee. The collection is limited, as only certain time periods are represented.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Budget Review Committee
bioghist.p: The Budget Review Committee existed as a standing committee of the university from at least 1970 to 2010. In 2010 it was discontinued and its function was absorbed into the newly created University Planning and Resourcing Council (UPRC).

The charge of the committee, as described in the 2001 Committee Listings was as follows: "The Committee meets at the call of its chair and makes recommendations for the annual operating budget of the university which is presented to the Board of Trustees by the president."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the agenda, minutes and related documents pertaining to the preparation of the annual operating budget of the university. The collection is far from complete.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in chronological order.
